type: Legendary Creature – Human Mercenary Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike
[i]Arena[/i] – Whenever Chrom, Arena Champion attacks, you may untap target creature defending player controls. That creature blocks Chrom if able. If you do, create a Treasure token.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Chrom attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Chrom gets +3/+3 until end of turn for each creature that blocks him this turn.
